p.s: On my way to Nick, I wondered why he said I should come alone to him.
I sometimes saw that he looked at me, but I never intrepreted it this way.
I also knew that he likes Jordan and he is kind of a good friend of Tom, but the situation was strange.
Anyways, it was a good way to escape from Tom and I like Nick.
He is very friendly.
When I arrived at his house, I directly noticed the house next to Nick's house.
It was enormous and beautiful.
I wondered who lived there, but I was late and Nick already came into the yard.
After I sent away Ferdie, we went in.
I was shocked how tiny the house was.
No place I would like to live in.
Nick acted strange, like something was wrong or missing.
I noticed that someone was in front of the door, but Nick already went in the direction to open it, so I just stayed in the living room.
After a few minutes a man came into the room, when I saw him, I right away knew, who he was: Jay Gatsby.
I was in shock, because I have never thought that I might see him today.
I wasn't even sure if I would see him again any time.
I mean, I imagined seeing him again a lot, but in my imaginations we were at his place.
I imagined it being a big house with a huge garden and many rooms.
I wondered if he owns the house next to Nick's house.
This would suit him.
EventhoughEven though this was a shock, I was really glad to see him.
I thought a lot about him, lately and got really excited.
He seemed kind of self-confident, but I could tell that he was really nervous, too.
The situation in general was really embarassingembarrassing.
I searched in my head for something to say, but I didn't really know what I had so many questions but they all seemed a bit strange to ask after not seeing eachothereach other for many years.
After some smalltalk Nick wanted to leave the room and I noticed that Jay got really nervous about the fact that he would be alone with me in a room then.
I was also nervous but I liked the idea of being alone with him.
But Jay followed Nick out of the room.
I heard voices from them and I was feeling uncomftarbeluncomfortable alone in this room.
After a few minutes Jay came back, alone.
He looked at me with shy eyes and sat next to me.
I wanted to know what is going on in his life and he told me a bit about his buisnessbusiness and his big parties with all his friends.
Jordan told me about them, they always seemed fun, but I didn't want to talk about the people he brings to his parties.
He didn't ask much about my life, maybe he didn't want me to talk about Tom or the fact that I am married.
I didn't know what to say and an embarassingembarrassing silence distributed in the room again.
Suddenly, Jay got closer to me and looked my right in the eyes.
He told me that he was really happy to see me and that he missed me.
I smiled.
I was really happy about the fact that he missed me.
I missed him, too and I enjoyed spending time with him.
He made me feel comftarblecomfortable and let me forget Tom and this sad life.
Jay gave me hope and made me feel happier than most of the time.
I got really emotional about the fact that this is not the reality and I had to go back to Tom after this day but I tried to just enjoy the moment of joy.
